name: Top of The Tower (Feishiko)
description:
A Roguelike Game with ASCII style.

 #TerminalJam

Source Code can be downloaded.

Game Engine:GMS2

Control

Allow Keys,hjklyubn,123456789 --- move

. or 5 --- wait

, --- pick or buy

esc --- back

< --- Go Upstairs

Target

Reach the top of the Tower
